scripts.clean: npm run clean:build && npm run clean:cache
scripts.clean:build: find . -name 'dist' -type d -not -path './node_modules/*' -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null; find . -name '.next' -type d -not -path './node_modules/*' -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null; find . -name 'build' -type d -not -path './node_modules/*' -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null; find . -name 'coverage' -type d -not -path './node_modules/*' -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null; rm -rf .turbo || true
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && rm -rf node_modules && pnpm install
scripts.size-check: npm run size:report && npm run size:analyze
